Greeting_Evening:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:Greeting>...Good evening.<sp:0:4:0>Pardon me. I was a bit absorbed in
my thoughts.
Talk_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>This relic is a special device. It has some
great purpose, as yet unknown to me.

<sp:3:0:2:0501>I have to find it out before the researchers
east in Kakariko Village or northeast in
Tarrey Town beat me to the punch.
I want to be known as the one who
unraveled this mystery!
Moving_Mornig:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Apologies, but I'm headed to my post.
Can we talk later?
Talk_02:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>By the bridge up ahead, there's a strange
spherical relic I have been studying. But
it's not the only one of its kind.
Similar relics have been sighted in two
other places—<sp:5:0:0>Kakariko Village in the east
and Tarrey Town to the northeast.
<sp:3:0:2:0c00>Perhaps I should try studying each of
them to see if they have any common
features.
Talk_03:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Researchers in Kakariko Village to the
east and Tarrey Town to the northeast
are also studying the spherical relics.
Well! I'm dead set on figuring out their
secrets before they do.
Moving_Rain:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Apologies, but I'd like to shelter from this
rain over in the tent. Can this wait?
Talk_04:
<sp:3:0:2:0b01><snd:SurpriseS>You did it! You got it to work!<sp:0:4:0>How did you—<sp:5:0:0> Wait, don't tell me.
Let me figure it out.
Talk_05:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:Think>So, if you put something on that dish,
it gets sucked in...
Talk_06:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Think>How in the world did you get that thing
out of there?<sp:0:4:0>Actually, don't tell me. I want to work it
out for myself.
Talk_08:
<sp:3:0:2:0a01><snd:Sad_00>Oh... Just a dream.


<sp:3:0:2:0300>I've been researching the spherical relic
up ahead near the suspension bridges.

But other researchers are studying similar
sites in Kakariko Village to the east and
Tarrey Town to the northeast.
<sp:3:0:2:0a01>I want to solve the relic riddles before
they do, but there's so much work left...<sp:5:1:0>
The urgency makes it hard to sleep.
Talk_09:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>All I can think about are those spherical
relics. They've even started to make
appearances in my dreams.
I don't want to lose out to those
researchers in Kakariko Village to the
east or Tarrey Town to the northeast.
<sp:3:0:2:0a01>But I'm so sleepy...<sp:5:1:0>
Balloon_Day: Is it some kind of device?
Talk_00:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00>What an unusual relic. And look... <sp:5:1:0>There's
something inside.

I believe this device is meant for some
special purpose, but as for what that
may be, who knows?
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Similar devices have been found in
Kakariko Village to the east and Tarrey
Town to the northeast.
I want to unlock this gizmo's secrets
before the researchers in those other
places do. I must!
Moving_Evening:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Apologies, but I was just on my way back
to the tent. Can we pick this up later?
